features.name: MottezÂ° Ski & Snowboard Carrier tow bar mounted
features.desc: MottezÂ° Ski & Snowboard Carrier tow bar mounted
features.marketingCopy:
For 6 pairs of skis, or 4 pairs of skis and 1 snowboard, or 2 pairs of skis and 2 snowboards. A quick click system mounts the carrier to the tow ball without using any tools. Skis & snowboards are lockable to the carrier and the carrier is lockable to the tow ball.

  • Foldable for continued access to the boot
  • Designed to carry all types of skis & snowboards
  • Skis & snowboards are easily accessible
  • Powder coated and thermo-hardened for anti-rust
  • Skis & snowboards aerodynamically mounted sidewards
  • Weight: 19 kg
  • Maximum load weight: 30 kg
features.warranty: Warranty covered by Ford supplier. For further details please ask your Ford dealer.

features.name: Ford Connected Wallbox
features.desc: Ford Connected Wallbox
features.marketingCopy:
Enjoy the convenience of a simple and fast charging experience at home with the Ford Connected Wallbox. It is specifically designed for flexible compatibility with the all-electric Ford Mustang Mach-E and Ford Plug-in Electric Vehicles. Thanks to its adjustable power levels, your Ford is back on the road as quickly as the capacity of your home electrical system allows. The user-friendly set up includes a weatherproof design for indoor or outdoor installation, 7.5 m cord, ergonomically designed handle and a dedicated coupler dock that lets you conveniently store your cable and coupler near your vehicleâ€™s charge port. Please note: effective charging times may vary depending on the household circuit current capacity of your home electrical system.

  • Adjustable output power up to a maximum of 7.36 kW/32 A, minimum current: 6 A
  • Input voltage: 230 V
  • Input frequency range: 50-60 Hz
  • Compatible with IT and TT earthing systems according to IEC 60364 standard
  • 7.5 m output cable with fixed IEC 62196 Type 2 connector
  • Bluetooth & Wi-Fi capability (5.0 GHz and 2.4 GHz 802.11 b/g/n)
  • Dynamic Color LED lights show power, connectivity and charging status
  • Capable for both indoor and outdoor installation thanks to IP-65 Protection Rating
  • Capable of post-mounting
  • Includes dedicated coupler dock for convenient cable and coupler storage
  • Coupler Holster keeps debris and dust out of the plug for clean and convenient usage
  • Ergonomically designed handle with rubber grip
  • IK08 rated impact-resistant faceplate (impact rate based on internal Ford testing)
  • Provides flexible wiring options (feed into unit from rear or bottom)
  • Dimensions: 258 mm x 450 mm x 131 mm (width x height x depth)
  • Weight: approx. 6 kg
  • Meets EU standards for health, safety, and environmental protection (CE marking)
  • Kit content: Ford Connected Wallbox, incl. removable outer cover, charging cable, charge coupler, remote dock/holster, wall mounting bracket, user and Installation manual, installation hardware (except installer-specific fitting material)

features.name: EVBoxÂ° Elvi Wall Box with fixed cable and kWh meter, up to 7.4kW charging capacity
features.desc: EVBoxÂ° Elvi Wall Box with fixed cable and kWh meter, up to 7.4kW charging capacity
features.marketingCopy: Smart and efficient home battery charging solution for your fully electric or hybrid vehicle. Charges with a significantly higher capacity than using a regular power outlet. Operates effortlessly through a WiFi connection. The charging management app "Hey EVBox" allows you to individually optimize power consumption and distribution as well as tracking and downloading your charging transactions from your mobile device or desktop computer (subscription required). The unique LED ring status indicator ensures an optimal communication between you and the station at all times. Easy to use, install and upgrade with modular click-on features. Requires very low maintenance due to its durable weatherproof and modular design. Mountable on a wall or pole (separately available as accessory). Additional cable dock for the wall mounted option is also separately available as accessory. Full-service installation by certified technicians provides fitment at the optimal location of your home. Main features: a charging capacity: 7.4kW. Connection capacity: single-phase, 230V â€“ 400V, 50-60 Hz. Max. output power: 32A. Cable length: 4 m. Dimensions including packaging (l x w x h): 420 mm x 325 mm x 425 mm. Weight: 9 kg. Fully CE-certified. Please note: the stated maximum charging capacity and output power are theoretical values. The actual charging efficiency when using the EVBox Elvi Wallbox strictly depends on various factors such as your home network configuration and performance, the performance of the charging cable used, the capacity of your vehicleâ€™s on-board charging and battery management system and the battery size. Please refer to the technical specifications of your home network and the vehicleâ€™s owners manual for the individual maximum achievable charging capabilities.
features.warranty: Warranty covered by Ford supplier. For further details please ask your Ford dealer.

features.name: EVBoxÂ° Elvi Cable Dock for use with Elvi Wall Box
features.desc: EVBoxÂ° Elvi Cable Dock for use with Elvi Wall Box
features.marketingCopy: Practical wall mounted storage solution for the charging cable and plug. Helps to keep the cable neatly out of your way around the charging area when not in use. Dimensions 124 mm x 250 mm x 92 mm. Weight: 1 kg
features.warranty: Warranty covered by Ford supplier. For further details please ask your Ford dealer.

features.name: EVBoxÂ° Elvi Pole with mounting points to secure to the ground
features.desc: EVBoxÂ° Elvi Pole with mounting points to secure to the ground
features.marketingCopy: Alternate mounting solution for Elvi wall box. Mounts to the ground when wall installation is not desired or possible. Includes a dock for the charging cable. Sleek, stainless steel design. Dimensions: 144 cm x 25 cm x 23 cm. Weight: 18 kg (wall box not included
features.warranty: Warranty covered by Ford supplier. For further details please ask your Ford dealer.
